verses.text: And it shall be, when thou \add art\add* come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and \w possessest|strong="H3423"\w* it, and \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* therein;

That thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of all the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, which thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, and shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in a \w basket|strong="H2935"\w*, and shalt \w go|strong="H1980"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to \w place|strong="H7931"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there.

And thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that shall be in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I \w profess|strong="H5046"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* for to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w basket|strong="H2935"\w* out of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and set it \w down|strong="H3240"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H6030"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, A \w Syrian|strong="H0761"\w* ready to \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \add was\add* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w* there \w with|strong="H4962"\w* a \w few|strong="H4592"\w*, and became there a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w*, and \w populous|strong="H7227"\w*:

And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* evil \w entreated|strong="H7489"\w* us, and \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* us, and \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* upon us \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*:

And when we \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* our \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* on our \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*, and our \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*, and our \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with an \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w terribleness|strong="H4172"\w*, and with \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, and with \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*:

And he hath \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* us into this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add even\add* a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

And now, behold, I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, which thou, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me. And thou shalt \w set|strong="H3240"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add thing\add* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee, and unto thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, thou, and the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

¶ When thou hast made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w tithing|strong="H6237"\w* all the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* of thine \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \add which is\add* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w tithing|strong="H4643"\w*, and hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, and be \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*;

Then thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I have brought \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the hallowed \w things|strong="H6944"\w* out of \add mine\add* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and also have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, and unto the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, to the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and to the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, according to all thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me: I have not \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, neither have I \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \add them:\add*

I have not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* thereof in my \w mourning|strong="H0205"\w*, neither have I taken \w away|strong="H1197"\w* \add ought\add* thereof for \add any\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add use\add*, nor \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add ought\add* thereof for the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: \add but\add* I have \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add and\add* have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me.

Look \w down|strong="H8259"\w* from thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*, from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us, as thou \w swarest|strong="H7650"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

¶ This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: thou shalt therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them with all thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Thou hast \w avouched|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to be thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and to \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w avouched|strong="H0559"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to be his \w peculiar|strong="H5459"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, as he hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* thee, and that \add thou\add* shouldest \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*;

And to \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w high|strong="H5945"\w* above all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which he hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, in \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*, and in \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and in \w honour|strong="H8597"\w*; and that thou mayest be an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.
